cases.Use a few words, avoid common phrases: Use a few words, avoid common phrases
cases.No need for symbols, digits, or uppercas: No need for symbols, digits, or uppercase letters
cases.Add another word or two. Uncommon words: Add another word or two. Uncommon words are better.
cases.Straight rows of keys are easy to guess: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess
cases.Short keyboard patterns are easy to gues: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess
cases.Use a longer keyboard pattern with more: Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns
cases.Repeats like \"aaa\" are easy to guess: Repeats like "aaa" are easy to guess
cases.Repeats like \"abcabcabc\" are only slig: Repeats like "abcabcabc" are only slightly harder to guess than "abc"
cases.Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to g: Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to guess
cases.Recent years are easy to guess: Recent years are easy to guess
cases.Dates are often easy to guess: Dates are often easy to guess
cases.Avoid years that are associated with you: Avoid years that are associated with you
cases.Avoid dates and years that are associate: Avoid dates and years that are associated with you
cases.This is similar to a commonly used passw: This is similar to a commonly used password
cases.This is a top-10 common password: This is a top-10 common password
cases.This is a top-100 common password: This is a top-100 common password
cases.This is a very common password: This is a very common password
cases.A word by itself is easy to guess: A word by itself is easy to guess
cases.Names and surnames by themselves are eas: Names and surnames by themselves are easy to guess
cases.Common names and surnames are easy to gu: Common names and surnames are easy to guess
cases.All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess: All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess as all-lowercase
cases.Reversed words aren't much harder to gue: Reversed words aren't much harder to guess
cases.Predictable substitutions like \"@\" ins: Predictable substitutions like "@" instead of "a"s don't help very much

pwned.title: Times found in leaks
pwned.subtitle: Times this password was found in known leaked databases.

crack.title: Time to crack
crack.subtitle: Time to crack this password on an ordinary computer.

firstSection.title: Upgrade your password security with unique passwords created with our password generator
description: Hackers are constantly attempting to crack people’s passwords for financial gain or to steal your data. They rely on stealing people’s personal information and brute-force attacks to crack passwords and exploit vulnerabilities.
At Internxt, we believe everyone should be safe from cyberattacks, which is why we created this secure password generator to maintain your safety and privacy online.

secondSection.title: Say goodbye to weak passwords with Internxt’s secure password generator
description: While it is possible to create strong passwords yourself, it can be a time-consuming and complicated process. With Internxt, a strong password or passkey is just one click away.
We developed our unique password generator that uses advanced algorithms to create unique passwords which follow these rules.
Our random password generator creates strong passwords that follow the three characteristics every password is recommended to have:

infoCards1.title: Long
infoCards1.description: Have a minimum length of 8 characters

infoCards1.title: Complex
infoCards1.description: Have a mix of numbers and symbols

infoCards1.title: Unique
infoCards1.description: Every password should only be used once

thirdSection.title: Our unique password generator does the hard work for you
description: This password generator will eliminate the stress of creating unique and random passwords whenever you need a new password.

Our password generator has a simple-to-use interface that you can customize. With our password generator, you will easily create powerful passwords that even the strongest computers would take centuries to break.

fourthSection.title: Maintain the security of your password with a random password generator
description: Using a secure password generator is the first step in taking control of your accounts and keeping them safe from attacks.
However, maintaining effective password security is an ongoing process that requires a solid awareness of the different steps you can take to protect your personal information.

bulletedList.title: Here are some tips to help you maintain the security of your passwords:
list: Regularly check if your password has been the target of attacks, and update it as necessary
Using a password manager from a reputable source
Keeping your software up-to-date so as not to become vulnerable to security bugs or vulnerabilities

fifthSection.title: Customize your saved passwords to meet your specifications
description: You can tailor each of your passwords to suit your specific needs and requirements. We realize that everyone has their own preferences when it comes to securing their privacy. With our secure password generator, you can customize:

infoCards2: Have a minimum length of 8 characters
Not contain 3 or more consecutive characters

section1.title: The importance of a safe password
section1.subtitle: Why do you need to use a password security checker and why is it important to periodically update or improve your passwords? Simply put, not all passwords are created equal. Some passwords are stronger than others.

section2.title: What is a strong password?
section2.subtitle: A strong password follows several rules and best practices making it more difficult to crack. A secure password should:
tips: Have a minimum length of 8 characters
Not contain 3 or more consecutive characters

section3.title: Protect your privacy with our secure password checker
section3.subtitle: Wondering “how secure is my password” or “will I pass a password test?”. Our free and secure password checker was designed to analyze, rate, and improve your passwords. With our tool, you can easily:
features: Analyze the complexity and character combination of your password
Determine the uniqueness of your password
Display how much time it would likely take to crack your password
Confirm your password meets all strong password requirements

section4.title: How safe is our online password checker?
description: It’s important to make sure that the online password checker you want to use is from a respected cyber security company. Before running any password manager, password checker, or password generator, check carefully that the website address is trusted and reliable.

All Internxt products and services are designed to put the user first above all else. Our password checker, just like our cloud services, is 100% [open-source](https://github.com/internxt) and independently verifiable.

section5.title: Why trust Internxt’s password security checker?
description: At Internxt, we create secure, encrypted, zero-knowledge technologies. All our services are developed with users’ [privacy](https://internxt.com/privacy) in mind and all of our services are built to keep your data safe.

We believe our password checker, along with our other free resources, online tools, and cloud storage services, should serve a free society and allow all persons to pursue excellence without fear for their digital security.
We do not store user data. We don’t make money from hosting ads or trading user data. We end-to-end encrypt all information uploaded to the Internxt cloud before it ever leaves a user’s device.

description.line1: Everithing you store is encrypted with
description.line2: the most complex and secure algorithms.
description.line3: Your data is only accessible by you.

section6.title: Other free tools for online security
description: Practicing [safe online strategies](https://blog.internxt.com/13-oversimplified-strategies-for-protecting-your-data-on-the-internet/) and using the right digital tools can dramatically lower the risk of identity theft and data breaches.
In addition to our password security checker, our free [Virus Scanner](https://internxt.com/virus-scanner) was designed to help you avoid infection and protect and remove malware from your computer.

We built a free [Byte Converter](https://internxt.com/byte-converter) that allows you to convert terabytes to gigabytes and more, in case your wondering how much actual storage you have left on your devices or drives.

We've also created a free [Temporary Email](https://internxt.com/temporary-email) service that allows you to create a disposable email address to sign-up for services, referrals, deals, newsletters, or web accounts without revealing your true identity.

Lastly, check out our [Privacy Directory](https://internxt.com/privacy), a curated list of digital rights organizations and nonprofits actively advocating for the right to privacy and the protection of internet users through social initiatives, digital education, and civil action.

CtaSection.title: Internxt Drive
CtaSection.description: Take control of your data with military-grade encryption.

CtaSection1.title: There's more to security than a strong password...

faq.question: How secure is my password with Internxt’s free tool?
answer: With Internxt’s password security checker, you can test your password and be sure that it is as secure as it can possibly be. Also, all passwords entered into our security password checker are not saved or stored in any way, leaving them safe to use for any of your accounts.

faq.question: How strong is my password?
answer: Generally, the longer and more complex, meaning the more different numbers, letters, and characters, the better. Type in your password in our Password Checker and find out!

faq.question: How to create a strong password?
answer: Follow the rules listed above or check out our article explaining [how to create strong passwords](https://blog.internxt.com/how-to-create-a-strong-password/). If you're still having trouble coming up with a good password, find a legitimate random password generator and let a trusted service do it for you. Just, be sure to remember the password it creates for you.

faq.question: How to check my password security?
answer: With Internxt’s Password Checker, you can test your password and be sure it is as secure as possible. Type in your password in our Password Checker and find out!

faq.question: How safe is Internxt’s Password Checker?
answer: With Internxt’s password security checker, you can test your password and be sure it is as secure as possible. Also, all passwords entered into our Password Checker are not saved or stored in any way, leaving them safe to use for any of your accounts.

faq.question: How to manage and remember complex passwords?
answer: Look into downloading a trusted password manager to manage all your passwords for you. Some browsers have password-saving and password-generator features included as well.

faq.question: What is an example of a strong password?
answer: A good example of a strong password is **fG,P6tQnRz-Ur$a**. The password is not easy to remember, but it is extremely difficult to crack. Password managers can help you create and manage strong passwords.
